name: QBall
overview: QBall is a 1 - 2 player arcade 3-D billiards game for multiple systems. The player plays billiards within a cube, where each corner represents the 8 separate pockets. The player aligns there shots with the white ball, and each player takes turns trying to place their shot. There is a 60 second shot clock, and the player can rotate the cube to examine the play area.
